mapper.select: select menu_id from b_role_menu where role_id = (select role_id from b_user_role where user_id=(select id from b_user where id=#{userId}))

select a.id,b.avatar,b.nickname,a.login_type,a.role_id,a.ip_address,a.ip_source,a.last_login_time,a.create_time,a.status from b_user a left join (select id,avatar,nickname from b_user_auth) b on a.user_auth_id=b.id
b.nickname like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and a.login_type=#{loginType}
order by a.create_time asc
select a.id,a.username,a.role_id,a.status,b.nickname,b.avatar from b_user a left join (select id,nickname,avatar from b_user_auth) b on a.user_auth_id=b.id where a.id = #{id}

select a.id,a.username,a.role_id,a.status,b.nickname,b.avatar from b_user a left join (select id,nickname,avatar from b_user_auth) b on a.user_auth_id=b.id where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update b_user set last_login_time = now(),ip_address=#{ip},ip_source=#{cityInfo},os=#{os},browser=#{browser} where id=#{loginId}
